title: Can I use the research that I did for an Experimental psychology class as research experience when applying to a Social psychology PhD program? I go to a small college and there aren't many (if at all) research opportunities. - Quora

response.answer_text: You might want to check with a professor about that. I reuse my information in different ways of saying it. I do not use it directly, but paraphrase or rewrite the work often. Different ways to say the same thing. Over time, I have more clarity and depth of understanding than I originally did.

Yes, and please make sure your own individual accountability in that project is communicated clearly. Do not bother with statements like “I was involved in …” So was the person who only made the coffees.
